channel.title: Pictures on moparscape server status checker?
channel.description: I am wondering how to put pictures on ur server status, I tried copy paste that didn't work, and i tried drag and drop, that didn't work, please tell me how. Thanks

I think ( I might be wrong ) you have to put it onto a site, such as, www.imageshack.us, then put the picture link like this, If im wrong someone correct me

If im wrong someone correct me[br][size=1]Posted on: October 06, 2007, 06:07:08 AM[/size][hr]Where the red cross is up there, i put
